body_html:
Hmm, I rewrote everything for the CSV input pipeline and switched all training code over to that. Network usage dropped off to a few KB/s (vs 2MB/s before), but it performs almost identically to the previous train. Training directly on the worker takes 11s, using client-server it takes ~40s.

This is a CPU worker, might those be single-threaded? Wondering if only GPU workers are expected. On the 11s train above done locally on the worker, CPU goes to many hundred % (box with 12 cores) during the train but rarely breaks 100% on the remote train.

body:
Hmm, I rewrote everything for the CSV input pipeline and switched all training code over to that.  Network usage dropped off to a few KB/s (vs 2MB/s before), but it performs almost identically to the previous train.  Training directly on the worker takes 11s, using client-server it takes ~40s.

This is a CPU worker, might those be single-threaded?  Wondering if only GPU workers are expected.  On the 11s train above done locally on the worker, CPU goes to many hundred % (box with 12 cores) during the train but rarely breaks 100% on the remote train.
